text: motor vehicles words defined convictions amend rsa to read as follows conviction conviction shall mean for the purposes of rsa a forfeiture of bail or collateral deposited to secure an appearance in court for the purposes of the commercial driver licensing statutes an adjudication of guilt which has not been annulled or vacated a determination that a person has violated or failed to comply with the law in a court of original jurisdiction or an administrative proceeding an unvacated forfeiture of bail or collateral deposited to secure the person s appearance in court a plea of guilty or nolo contendere accepted by the court the payment of a fine or court costs or the violation of a condition of release without bail regardless of whether the penalty is rebated suspended or otherwise affected by probation
